# se-block-content



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | Type     | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `option` | `option`  | The block-content component will add 8px padding on the top and bottom, and 16px padding on the left and right by default. If you add`option="fill"` to the block-content component, the content will fill the whole space of the block-content with no padding. | `"fill"` | `undefined` |
